content.prompt: Which of the following can be used to replace  /* missing code */  so that the  difference  method works as intended?

choices.label:
if (predicted[i] - actual[i] < num) 
{ 
   num = predicted[i] - actual[i];
   idx = i; 
}

if (predicted[i] - actual[i] > num)

   num = predicted[i] - actual[i];
   idx = i;
}

{

   idx = i;
}

{ 
   num = Math.abs(predicted[i] - actual[i]);
   idx = i;
}
